title: Textile, "Aviary", 1910–17
medium:
Medium: silk
Technique: block printed on plain weave
dimensions: Warp x Weft: 19.1 x 27.3 cm (7 1/2 x 10 3/4 in.)
creditline: Museum purchase from General Acquisitions Endowment Fund
description: Large scale pattern of exotic foliage and birds in light green, light purple, pink, mauve, dark red, and white on a black ground.
